title: Burton RFC
text:
Burton Rugby Club is an <a href="England">English</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> team based in <a href="Burton%20upon%20Trent">Burton upon Trent</a> in <a href="Staffordshire">Staffordshire</a>. The club operates six senior teams, including an under-22s team, academy sides and a full range of junior teams. The first XV currently plays in <a href="Midlands%20Premier">Midlands Premier</a> following their promotion as champions of <a href="Midlands%201%20West">Midlands 1 West</a> at the end of the 2017-18 season.
History.
Burton Rugby Club was formed on 5 October 1870 as Burton Football Club, retaining that name until the word 'rugby' was added in 2001. The club played at <a href="Peel%20Croft">Peel Croft</a>, from 1910 until it moved to a new ground at <a href="Tatenhill">Tatenhill</a> in 2020.
